sys_script_include.name: GoogleBooksAPIService

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_11a78f2f93d74210ef267c5efaba107c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383151_bkquest.GoogleBooksAPIService</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GoogleBooksAPIService</name><script><![CDATA[var GoogleBooksAPIServiceService = Class.create();
GoogleBooksAPIServiceService.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    executeGoogleBooksAPIServiceCall: function(isbn) {
        var endpoint = 'https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes';
        var apiKey = 'AIzaSyAouWbxNvLFUZyOUs-3kbiwn6f32PYUHqk';
        var url = endpoint + '?q=isbn:' + isbn + '&key=' + apiKey;

        var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        request.setHttpMethod('GET');
        request.setEndpoint(url);
        request.setRequestHeader('Accept', 'application/json');

        var response = request.execute();
        var responseBody = response.getBody();
        var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();

        if (httpStatus == 200) {
            var apiResponse = JSON.parse(responseBody);

            // Extracting book details from API response
            var title = apiResponse.volumeInfo.title;
            var authors = apiResponse.volumeInfo.authors ? apiResponse.volumeInfo.authors.join(', ') : '';
            var publishedDate = apiResponse.volumeInfo.publishedDate || '';
            var description = apiResponse.volumeInfo.description || '';
            var pageCount = apiResponse.volumeInfo.pageCount || 0;
            var categories = apiResponse.volumeInfo.categories ? apiResponse.volumeInfo.categories.join(', ') : '';
            var averageRating = apiResponse.volumeInfo.averageRating || 0;
            var ratingsCount = apiResponse.volumeInfo.ratingsCount || 0;
            var language = apiResponse.volumeInfo.language || '';
            var thumbnail = apiResponse.volumeInfo.imageLinks ? apiResponse.volumeInfo.imageLinks.thumbnail || '' : '';

            // Create or update the record in ServiceNow table
            var bookRecord = new GlideRecord('x_1383151_bkquest_book');
            bookRecord.initialize();  // Initialize a new record

            bookRecord.setValue('title', title);
            bookRecord.setValue('author', authors);  // Assuming you store authors as a string
            bookRecord.setValue('date_of_publication', publishedDate);
            bookRecord.setValue('plot_summary', description);
            bookRecord.setValue('no_of_pages', pageCount);
            bookRecord.setValue('genre', categories);  // Assuming you store categories as a string
            bookRecord.setValue('average_rating', averageRating);
            bookRecord.setValue('ratings_count', ratingsCount);
            bookRecord.setValue('language', language);
            bookRecord.setValue('cover_image', thumbnail);
            bookRecord.setValue('isbn', isbn);

            var sysId = bookRecord.insert();  // Insert or update the record

            gs.info('Book details inserted successfully. Sys ID: ' + sysId);
        } else {
            gs.error('Failed to retrieve book details from Google Books API. HTTP Status: ' + httpStatus);
        }
    },

    type: 'GoogleBooksAPIServiceService'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harini.srija</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-16 05:30:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>11a78f2f93d74210ef267c5efaba107c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GoogleBooksAPIService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BookQuest" source="x_1383151_bkquest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BookQuest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_11a78f2f93d74210ef267c5efaba107c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>harini.srija</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-16 06:22:52</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
